tasks.title: Bootstrap
tasks.notes: Branch created, dependencies installed, QA baseline captured (PHPUnit shows 4 pre-existing deprecations).

tasks.title: Capability coherence
tasks.notes: All admin/AJAX flows now rely on the hic_manage capability via hic_require_cap().

tasks.title: SQL safety & identifier sanitization
tasks.notes: Introduced strict identifier sanitization helper and refactored optimizer/poller queries to rely on sanitized names with prepared statements.

tasks.title: Download log hardening
tasks.notes: Protezione directory log con .htaccess/web.config, sanificazione filename e streaming buffered con wp_die finale.

tasks.title: Archiviazione progressiva via AJAX
tasks.notes: Archivio manuale trasformato in job AJAX riprendibile con stato persistito, rate limiting e nuova UI con barra di avanzamento.

tasks.title: Debounce watchdog cron
tasks.notes: Inserito transient di debounce da 60s in ensure_scheduler_is_active() per limitare i controlli reiterati.
